metadata.title: CVE-2020-13231 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, auth_profile.php?action=edit allows CSRF for anadmin email change.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
